section_title: 21a03 - Use of FOH Chapter 21 and IB 779.
text:
IB 779 contains the
basic interpretations by the Adm of the scope and terms of the retail and
service establishment and related exemptions. FOH Chapter 21 supplements these interpretations.
html: IB 779 contains the basic interpretations by the Adm of the scope and terms of the retail and service establishment and related exemptions. FOH Chapter 21 supplements these interpretations.
